title: Notifications
subtitle: Here, you will find all the notifications sent by the institution. You can filter them by Fiscal Code, IUN Code, send date and status.
manual-send-disabled-message: It is not possible to send new notifications at this moment.
manual-send-disabled-action: Check the status of the platform

payment.title: Payments
payment.subtitle-single: Here, you can track the payment status of the pagoPA alerts attached to the notification.
payment.subtitle-single-f24: Here, you can see the F24 forms attached to the notification.
payment.subtitle-multiple: To see the payment status of the pagoPA alerts attached to the notification, select a recipient.
payment.subtitle-multiple-f24: To see the F24 forms attached to the notification, select a recipient.
payment.f24-dialog-title: F24 forms attached to the notification {{iun}}

empty-state.filtered: We did not find any results: try different filters. <0>Remove filters</0>.
empty-state.no-notifications: The agency has not yet sent any notifications. Use the <0>API Keys</0> or <1>send manually</1>.
empty-state.timeout: No results found; try again with different filters

detail.document-not-available: The document will be available for download in a few minutes. You can try again by reloading the page or clicking on the link of the requested document
detail.alert-cancellation-in-progress: The sending entity has requested the cancellation of this notification. Your status will be updated at the end of the cancellation process.
detail.alert-cancellation-confirmed: This notification has been canceled by the sending institution. Recipients will no longer be able to download the attached documents or the certificates enforceable against third parties.

cancel-notification-modal.notification-cancelled-successfully: Your cancellation request has been accepted.
cancel-notification-modal.title: Do you want to cancel the notification?
cancel-notification-modal.message: Recipients will no longer be able to download the attached documents or the certificates enforceable against third parties. The operation is irreversible.
cancel-notification-modal.message-with-payment: By canceling the notification, you declare that you are aware that any reimbursement activity in favor of the recipients remains the responsibility of the sending institution.

generic_error.message: An error occurred while canceling. Try again.

delivery_file_info_not_found.title: The document is not available
delivery_file_info_not_found.message: A problem occurred while retrieving the document. Please try again later. If the error persists, contact the support team  and provide the error details.

delivery_notification_without_payment_at.title: The document is not available
delivery_notification_without_payment_at.message: A problem occurred while retrieving the document. Please try again later. If the error persists, contact the support team  and provide the error details.

delivery_timeout.title: No results
delivery_timeout.message: No results found; try using different filters.

delivery_push_file_not_found.title: The document is not available
delivery_push_file_not_found.message: A problem occurred while retrieving the document. Please try again later. If the error persists, contact the support team  and provide the error details.

detail.download-message-available: Documents are available online for 120 days from the finalization of the notification.
detail.download-message-expired: As 120 days have passed since the completion date, the documents are no longer available.
detail.download-aar-available: The notification of receipt is available online for 10 years from the finalization of the notification.
detail.download-aar-expired: As 10 years have passed since the finalization date, the notification of receipt is no longer available.

status.delivered-tooltip: The sending of the notification is completed
status.delivered-tooltip-multirecipient: The sending of the notification is completed
status.delivered-description: The sending of the notification is completed.

status.delivering-description: The sending of the notification is in progress.

status.paid-description: The recipient has paid the costs of the notification

status.effective-date-multirecipient: Finalized due to expiry of deadline

status.effective-date-description-multirecipien: The notification was not read by the deadline.

status.viewed-description-multirecipient: At least one recipient has read the notification.

status.canceled-description: The institution has canceled the sending of the notification.
status.notification-timeline-reworked-descripti: Events marked as INVALIDATED EVENT should not be considered as they have been replaced by subsequent events marked as VALIDATED EVENT.

new-notification.title: Send a new notification
new-notification.subtitle: To send a notification, enter the required details and add payment forms. If you need to send a mass email, you can use the

prompt.title: Do you want to exit?
prompt.message: If you exit, you will lose all data entered so far. To send a new notification, you need to start over.

new-notification.drag-doc-with-format-pc: Drag the document in {{type}} format here
new-notification.warning-payment-disabled: Notifications involving a payment can only be sent via API Key at this time.

preliminary-informations.fetch-groups-error: We were unable to retrieve the data required to create a new notification.
preliminary-informations.title: Preliminary information
preliminary-informations.protocol-number-subtitle: It is the unique code provided by the Registry Office of the Public Administration. It is used to officially identify the notification and track its path within the system.
preliminary-informations.subject: Notification subject
preliminary-informations.no-groups: There are no groups for this product
preliminary-informations.taxonomy-id-subtitle: It is the code that defines the type of notified documents. If you do not know it, consult the list in <0>SEND Taxonomy</0>.
preliminary-informations.taxonomy-tooltip: It is the code that defines the type of notification. You can find more information in the SEND manual.
preliminary-informations.comunication-type-subtitle: If digital delivery is not possible, the notification will be sent via analog means in the selected mode.
preliminary-informations.simple-registered-letter: Registered mail with acknowledgment of receipt
preliminary-informations.notification-language-subtitle: The notification, documents, and certificates will be sent according to the selected language preferences.
preliminary-informations.notification-content-subtitle: This information will help the recipient understand the content and importance of the communication.
preliminary-informations.notification-management-subtitle: Choose the user group responsible for managing the notification.

recipient.title: Recipients
recipient.identical-fiscal-codes-error: A recipient with this Fiscal Code already exists. Please enter a different one.
recipient.notice-code-error: Enter a code of 18 numeric characters
recipient.name: First name
recipient.digital-domicile-subtitle: If you know the recipient's PEC address, enter it here. This ensures the notification is delivered in digital forma, reducing delivery times compared to traditional analog channels.
recipient.address-subtitle: Choose whether to allow SEND to automatically enter the address from national registries. Automatic entry may delay notification delivery. Alternatively, you can fill in the address manually.
recipient.address-physical-lookup-down: Currently, the address cannot be retrieved from national registries. Please enter the address manually.

attachments.title: Documentation
attachments.max-attachments: These are the documents that will be notified via SEND to all recipients. You can attach up to a maximum of {{maxNumber}} documents.
attachments.banner-additional-languages: You have chosen to send the notification in multiple languages. Remember to attach documents in both selected languages.
attachments.file-upload-helper: The document must be in {{format}} format and must not exceed {{size}}

debt-position.title: Debt position
debt-position.which-type-of-payments: What type of payment are you planning?

debt-position-detail.title: Debt position detail

notification-fee.title: Notification fee
notification-fee.description: Choose the type of notification fee: you can choose between the one already included in the document or enter a custom notification fee to be paid by the recipient.
notification-fee.pa-fee-format: The notification fee must be a value between 0.01 and 1.00 and must contain a maximum of 2 decimal places.
notification-fee.disclaimer: VAT will only be applied to notifications delivered in paper format.
notification-fee.pa-fee-validation: Enter a value between 0 and 1 with a maximum of 2 decimal places
notification-fee.pa-fee-currency: Enter a value with a maximum of 2 decimal places

pagopa-int-mode.title: Payment technology
pagopa-int-mode.description: In synchronous mode, the debt position is held by the Payee's (EC) system, while in asynchronous mode, it is uploaded to the pagoPA Debt Position Management (GPD) system. <0>Find out more</0>

debt-position-detail.alert: If you do not have certain information regarding pagoPA integration, check with your technology provider: if the choice is incorrect, the notification charge may be wrong.

radios.flat-rate: Included in the act (flat-rate), at the expense of the recipient
radios.delivery-mode: Not included in the act (specific), at the expense of the recipient

debt-position-detail.identical-notice-codes-error: A payment with this Notice Code already exists. Please enter a different one.
debt-position-detail.at-least-one-applycost: Apply notification fees to at least one payment.
debt-position-detail.identical-sha256-error: It is not possible to upload the same file more than once. Please upload a different file.

payment-methods.title: Payment models
payment-methods.nothing: <0>If this notification involves a payment, go back to </0><1>Preliminary information</1><2> and select a model. Then, return here to upload it.</2>
payment-methods.apply-cost-installment: Warning: if the possibility of installment payments is provided, you must apply the notification fee to only one installment.

sync-feedback.title: Notification has been created
sync-feedback.message: You can find updates on its status in the "Notifications" section

fiscal_code.title: Invalid Fiscal Code
fiscal_code.message: The Fiscal Code for one or more recipients is invalid.

invalid_parameter.title: Invalid data
invalid_parameter.message: One or more of the data entered are invalid.

invalid_parameter_protocol_number_duplic.title: Invalid data
invalid_parameter_protocol_number_duplic.message: The protocol number entered already exists.

invalid_parameter_notice_code_duplicate.title: Invalid Notice Code
invalid_parameter_notice_code_duplicate.message: The Notice Code {{duplicatedNoticeCode}} has already been used.

generic_invalid_parameter_notice_code_du.title: Invalid Notice Code
generic_invalid_parameter_notice_code_du.message: One of the Notice Codes you entered has already been used.

invalid_parameter_taxonomy_code.title: The taxonomic code is invalid
invalid_parameter_taxonomy_code.message: Check the code you entered and try again. If the error persists, contact the support team and provide the error details.

delivery_notification_limit_exceeded.title: You have reached the notification limit
delivery_notification_limit_exceeded.message: You cannot create new notifications at this time because you have already reached the maximum monthly number.

delivery_invalid_parameter_group.title: The user group is invalid
delivery_invalid_parameter_group.message: Check the group you selected and try again. If the error persists, contact the support team and provide the error details.

settings.language-settings-subtitle: In this section, you can choose an additional language to send the notification [cite: 8] to the recipients, in addition to Italian.
